attributes.action: G.P's need to take thyroid illnesses SERIOUSLY!
attributes.additional_details: Please wake up the medical practitioners around the uk when dealing with thyroid issues! They will not take it seriously! Yet I read time and time again on NHS WEBSITE how serious having these conditions that affect the thyroid have on health and life they really are playing with people's lives this needs addressing and very soon! Its surprising how many of the thyroid patients suffer weight issues, depression, anxiety, nervousness, fatigue the list is endless of the complications the thyroid is capable of creating yet many GP's are not willing to treat this condition effectively or safely leaving people living on a knife edge, this has to stop!!

rejection.details: Must include full name of petitioner.
